text: Nan adarasi, ia guizɨn akar mogomer mam gɨfoghasa kɨ ia mɨgei. Ia a gɨfoghɨva, kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogham, ia fofozir ekiam iti. Akar kam kamakɨn: Israelɨn marazi datɨrɨghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikian aghua; men arazir kam zurara ikɨvɨra ikian kogham. Me kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizir God mɨseveziba bar God bagh izamin dughiamɨn tugham. Eghtɨ me gɨn Godɨn gumazamizibar tongɨn ikiam.
